bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.description: This might be an intellij issue, but it might be related to some of our maven plugins also? I am seeing this frequently on both Windows and Linux, and is quite disruptive. It also seems to result in some occasions on old code/dependencies being used when tests are run. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2360237/36588620-c8dbb8d2-18dc-11e8-9d5c-258683fadad8.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I think this issue is irrelevant now?
No, it still occurs, still no idea why.
This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
